tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE predictive_maintenance_models (
  equipment_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  sensor_data STRING,
  maintenance_required BOOL
)

CREATE TABLE predictive_maintenance (
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  maintenance_cost DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
  log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  technician_name TEXT,
  maintenance_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Equipment (
    equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    installation_date DATE,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
    maintenance_history JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    maintenance_date TIMESTAMP,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    maintenance_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumption (
    consumption_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    consumption_date DATE,
    energy_consumed DECIMAL,
    power_consumed DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE PredictiveModels (
    model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_type VARCHAR(50),
    model_accuracy DECIMAL,
    deployment_date DATE,
    equipment_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE SensorData (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  reading FLOAT
);
